sentences.en: According to this study, women have made notable gains at the expense of men.
sentences.cn: 根据这项研究，女性以牺牲男性的利益为代价而获得了显著的收益。

sentences.en: Every country in the world signed the treaty, with one notable exception - the United States.
sentences.cn: 全世界每个国家都签署了那份条约，只有一个国家反其道而行之，就是美国。

sentences.en: He fought many hard battles and achieved notable merits , but he remains humble in spirits.
sentences.cn: 他参加过许多战役,立下了汗马功劳, 但他仍然很谦虚.

sentences.en: He wrote and published the essay under notable's name.
sentences.cn: 他假托名人写文章发表.
他的成就是非常显著的.

sentences.en: If there are any notable inconsistencies or discrepancies, think through how you are going to explain the situation.
sentences.cn: 如果有任何显著的不相符或让人起疑的情况，要想好该如何去解释这个情况。

sentences.en: Mo did not want to be ruled by anyone and it is notable that she never allowed the men in her life to eclipse her.
sentences.cn: 莫不想受任何人支配，而且很明显她从不容许自己生活里的男性光芒盖过自己。

sentences.en: Several notable researchers are studying the effects of hyperventilation.
sentences.cn: 几位著名的研究人员正在研究通气过度的后果。

sentences.en: She became quite a notable director in the thirties and forties.
sentences.cn: 她在三四十年代成了一位名导演。

sentences.en: The book stands out as one of the notable landmarks in the progress of modern science.
sentences.cn: 这部著作是现代科学发展史上著名的里程碑之一.

sentences.en: The drawing room is particularly notable for its splendid oak panelling.
sentences.cn: 客厅富丽堂皇的橡木镶板特别引人注目.

sentences.en: The town is notable for its busy open-air market.
sentences.cn: 该城镇因其热闹的露天市场而出名。

sentences.en: There were notable jousts with the Secretary of Commerce.
sentences.cn: 和商业部长之间明显存在竞争。

sentences.en: Tuesday's notable gainer was Sony, which reached a high of 9,070 yen.
sentences.cn: 星期二的大赢家为索尼公司，其股票上涨至9,070日元的高点。

sentences.en: Two notable regulatory changes resulted from enactment of Pub. L . 96 - 295.
sentences.cn: 在颁布的《公法》96—295条中,有两项改动引起人们的注意.

sentences.en: Up to the time of his death, Richard Colson was one of the notable figures in our town.
sentences.cn: 理查德.科尔森直到去世时一直是我们镇上最有名的人物之一.

sentences.en: With a few notable exceptions, doctors are a pretty sensible lot.
sentences.cn: 除了一些有趣的例外，医生都是些讲求实际的家伙。

words.tran_cn: 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 值得注意的，显著的，著名的
trans.tran_en: important, interesting, excellent, or unusual enough to be noticed or mentioned
